subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
Hydrogen
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A hydrogen-fueled vehicle will lead the field at a Nascar race for the first time when a 2016 Toyota Mirai serves as the official pace car Saturday night at Richmond, Va.
snippet: A hydrogen-fueled vehicle will lead the field at a Nascar race for the first time when a 2016 Toyota Mirai serves as the official pace car Saturday night at Richmond, Va.
